comments.raw_text:
We currently only have a few CF_HTML tests inside of editor/libeditor/html/tests/test_CF_HTML_clipboard.html.

1) We do not currently test (as far as I know) how we generate CF_HTML.  It would be nice for the test to actually copy a block of HTML instead of feeding CF_HTML format directly.

2) We should expand the current tests we have for more things like tables, lists, and other elements.   A dozen or so more tests would be nice.

3) I believe we just search for a keyword in the pasted CF_HTML, we should have a bit more restrictive tests.

3) I believe we just search for a keyword in the pasted CF_HTML, we should have a bit more restrictive tests.
